Title: Cornering Gor'krosh
Description:
If Gor'krosh is a truly a raptor, you should be able to track it down just like any other animal.

See if you can find its trail. We know it's been around here recently. Corner it in its lair and end this once and for all!

Make sure you return to Razor Hill straight away once you make the kill. The Farseer will need proof of the deed.

Thank you, $n. May the spirits guide your blade. Lok-tar!
ObjectivesText: Hunt down Gor'krosh and return to Razor Hill with proof of your kill.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Farseer Aggralan in Razor Hill
